header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 235-45r19 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA

content.body:
### Shop 235/45R19 Tire Size If you drive a Jeep Compass, Ford Escape, Lexus ES, Mazda MPV, Honda CR-V, Volvo S60 Cross Country or Audi Allroad, there’s a good chance that you’re riding on 235/45R19 tires. When you look down the lists, you’ll see that it’s a pretty popular size for a wide range of compacts and sporty crossovers. For many drivers of these kinds of vehicles, all-season tires are the logical choice; they offer a comfortable ride, low road noise, long tread life, year-round traction even in light snow and responsive, predictable handling. At SimpleTire, some of our favorite 235/45R19 all-season tires include the Michelin Premier LTX, Pirelli Scorpion Verde All Season, [Firestone Destination LE3](https://simpletire.com/brands/firestone-tires/destination-le3), Yokohama Geolandar X-CV, and Kumho Crugen HP71. Popular vehicles: 2017-2021 Jeep Compass
2013-2019 Ford Escape
2012-2015 Lexus ES
2006-2010 Mazda MPV
2004-2006 Honda CR-V
2015-2018 Volvo S60 Cross Country
2004-2005 Audi Allroad Of course, many crossovers are equipped with AWD or full-time 4WD, making them a great choice for areas that have hard winters with lots of snow. Unfortunately, all-season tires often tend to lose traction in heavy snow and slush. If that’s the case where you are, you should consider dedicated winter tires like the Michelin X-Ice Snow, Nokian Hakkapeliitta 9 SUV, Yokohama BlueEarth Winter V905, or [Toyo Observe GSi-6 HP](https://simpletire.com/brands/toyo-tires/observe-gsi-6-hp). Modern winter tires are engineered for excellent grip in snow and slush while still offering the road manners of all season tires; just remember to change them out when temperatures are above about 40 degrees F, as they wear quickly in warmer weather. Many of the crossovers that use 235/45R19 tires are sporty models that could benefit from the sharp handling and steering response of ultra-high-performance (UHP) tires like the Michelin Pilot Sport All Season 4, [Yokohama Advan Sport V105](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/advan-sport-v105), or Pirelli P Zero Rosso. Just be mindful of the fact that the softer, “stickier” rubber compound of UHP tires provides excellent traction and cornering, but will harden in colder weather. UHP tires should be changed out when the thermometer goes below about 45 degrees Fahrenheit. Whether you drive a Ford Escape, Jeep Compass, Volvo S60 Cross Country, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 235/45R19 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
